definitions: relating to or denoting sexual pleasure gained from watching others when they are naked or engaged in sexual activity

examples.text: women as objects of voyeuristic pleasure

shortDefinitions: relating to or denoting sexual pleasure gained from watching others when they are naked or engaged in sexual activity

definitions: deriving or relating to enjoyment from seeing the pain or distress of others

examples.text: the voyeuristic pleasure of spying on relationships under pressure
there is something uncomfortably voyeuristic about being led into the hospital room

shortDefinitions: deriving or relating to enjoyment from seeing pain or distress of others
